name: github_issues
description: Manage GitHub issues - list, create, update, and comment on issues in a repository. Requires GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable.

action.description: The action to perform: list (list issues), create (new issue), get (single issue), update (modify issue), comment (add comment)

owner.description: Repository owner (username or organization). Default: strugcity

state.description: Filter issues by state (for list action). Default: open

issue_number.description: Issue number (required for get, update, comment actions)

labels.description: Labels to apply to the issue
